医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调空气污染是自闭症风险的关键环境因素空气污染是自闭症的一个关键环境风险因素，通过神经炎症、氧化应激和表观遗传变化影响神经发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-highlights-air-pollution-as-key-environmental-factor-in-autism-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-highlights-air-pollution-as-key-environmental-factor-in-autism-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72518970-4302-4f3d-b268-1d6a2d9aed1f Thu, 14 Nov 2024 08:38:00 -0500 Study highlights air pollution as key environmental factor in autism risk
维生素 D 可以降低肥胖老年人的血压补充维生素 D3 和钙可降低老年人、超重人群的血压，尤其是体重指数较高且患有高血压的人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Vitamin-D-may-lower-blood-Pressure-in-older-people-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Vitamin-D-may-lower-blood-Pressure-in-older-people-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a91352d7-da65-4c01-b5ed-4dc76187c4a5 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 08:33:00 -0500 Vitamin D may lower blood pressure in older people with obesity
新研究揭示体重指数对疾病发病机制的影响该研究强调了体重指数在调节疾病遗传风险中的作用，表明其与心力衰竭和骨关节炎等疾病之间存在复杂的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/BMIs-influence-on-disease-pathogenesis-uncovered-in-new-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/BMIs-influence-on-disease-pathogenesis-uncovered-in-new-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ac1a9f1-682e-4042-afc5-64e995739e37 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 08:13:00 -0500 BMI's influence on disease pathogenesis uncovered in new research
创新的尿液检测可以提高胰腺癌的生存率创新的尿液 miRNA 分析显示了早期胰腺癌检测的潜力，具有高精度和灵敏度，改变了筛查实践。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Innovative-urine-test-could-improve-pancreatic-cancer-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Innovative-urine-test-could-improve-pancreatic-cancer-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5abea4d9-9686-430b-b611-4ea2953e44c3 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 08:06:00 -0500 Innovative urine test could improve pancreatic cancer survival rates
研究人员在可吸入 mRNA 药物方面取得进展大多数人不喜欢注射治疗或疫苗。因此，研究人员正在努力创造更多的药物，例如由信使 RNA (mRNA) 制成的可喷雾和吸入的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Researchers-make-progress-toward-inhalable-mRNA-medicines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Researchers-make-progress-toward-inhalable-mRNA-medicines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbe8d007-9396-47f2-95b0-0fa452891f69 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 07:54:02 -0500 Researchers make progress toward inhalable mRNA medicines
膀胱癌治疗的进展为治疗带来希望根据《新英格兰医学杂志》发表的一篇社论，膀胱癌治疗的最新进展可能为更多患者带来治疗的希望，包括那些患有高危局部肌肉侵袭性疾病的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Advances-in-bladder-cancer-treatments-offer-hope-for-curative-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Advances-in-bladder-cancer-treatments-offer-hope-for-curative-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e31aa50-0248-4f0a-8836-594108ec4e5b Thu, 14 Nov 2024 07:34:38 -0500 Advances in bladder cancer treatments offer hope for curative care
新疫苗显示出预防三阴性乳腺癌复发的潜力一项小型临床试验显示，接受旨在预防肿瘤复发的研究疫苗的三阴性乳腺癌患者取得了有希望的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/New-vaccine-shows-pottial-in-preventing-recurrence-of-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/New-vaccine-shows-pottial-in-preventing-recurrence-of-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6ecd4b4-d11e-4678-8b02-8b945890e3e5 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 07:27:59 -0500 New vaccine shows potential in preventing recurrence of triple-negative breast cancer
社区伙伴关系为神经多样性个体带来更具包容性的医疗保健一篇新论文展示了如何与社区合作可以带来更具包容性的医疗保健，特别是对于患有自闭症和其他神经发育障碍的个人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Community-partnerships-lead-to-more-inclusive-health-care-for-neurodiverse-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Community-partnerships-lead-to-more-inclusive-health-care-for-neurodiverse-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d874babf-b01a-4b5c-9fa2-c15ac80caa57 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 07:10:38 -0500 Community partnerships lead to more inclusive health care for neurodiverse individuals
Primerdesign 在伦敦兽医展上推出新的动物多重检测Primerdesign（Novacyt Group 的一部分）是一家专注于设计、制造、验证和供应实时 PCR 试剂盒和试剂的公司，该公司宣布将在 2019 年推出两种针对狗和猫胃肠道 (GI) 疾病的新检测方法。伦敦兽医展，2024 年 11 月 14 日至 15 日举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Primerdesign-launches-new-animal- Multiplex-assays-at-London-Vet-Show.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Primerdesign-launches-new-animal- Multiplex-assays-at-London-Vet-Show.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45674265-03be-47be-b19f-2693bddbdfe2 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 06:23:00 -0500 Primerdesign launches new animal multiplex assays at London Vet Show
研究确定了桑德霍夫病和泰萨克斯病的潜在治疗方法在一项开创性的研究中，麦克马斯特大学的研究人员发现了桑霍夫病和泰萨克斯病的潜在治疗方法，这两种罕见且往往致命的溶酶体贮积症会导致大脑和脊髓神经细胞进行性损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-identizes-a-pottial-treatment-for-Sandhoff-and-Tay-Sachs-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-identizes-a-pottial-treatment-for-Sandhoff-and-Tay-Sachs-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5c3436c-ca09-4743-aaf9-5f66884530d4 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 06:19:00 -0500 Study identifies a potential treatment for Sandhoff and Tay-Sachs diseases
